application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
site_name: Wickes Site153-161 London RoadKingston Upon ThamesKT2 6NU
description: Details required for Condition 3 (Materials), 5 (Dust Management Plan), 14 (Construction Method Statement) and 17 (Secured by Design) of planning permission 21/00332/FUL (Change of Use of existing retail warehouse to enable sale of food and non-food retail items, to include elevational alterations to building, installation of plant and a substation, re-configuration of site car park,  increase in floorspace at mezzanine level, landscaping, servicing, and other associated works)
decision_conditions: Due to the insufficient information submitted for Condition 17 (Secured by Design) of planning permission 21/00332/FUL the proposal fails to achieve the principles and objectives of Secured by Design to improve community safety and crime prevention in accordance with Policy CS 14 of Kingston Core Strategy: Safer Communities, Policy DM 22 Design for Safety and Policy SD6  of the London Plan (2021).
